page.title: 18ARTS AND CRAFTS 2
page.content: {POTTERY.} There is a Potter in this area who has developed the making of pictures in relief. Different coloured clays are used to achieve the visual effect and it is completed with a clean glaze. {BLACKSMITH. } Barnshaw Smithy was opened in 1982 in a disused Shippon. The Smithy specialises in ornamental iron work e.g. gates, railings, firegrates, fire irons and water pumps. The Black Smith designs these articles and also repairs existing items:- agricultural equipment etc. Another aspect of his work is the restoration of antique iron work gates from the Dunham Estate. This involves research into the history of the item and its maker in order that the restored article may compliment the original style.
